source.b75ed002:
from keras.models import Sequential
from keras.layers import Dense
source.86b0407d:
classify = Sequential()
classify.add( Dense( units=30, activation='relu', input_dim=30  ) )
classify.add( Dense( units=30, activation='relu' ) )
classify.add( Dense( units=30, activation='relu'  ) )
classify.add( Dense( units=30, activation='relu'  ) )
classify.add(Dense(units=1, activation='sigmoid'))

classify.compile( optimizer='adam',loss='binary_crossentropy', metrics=['binary_accuracy'])
